name: Syncopus
description:
Description
Syncopus is a 2D music game in which the player controls a character named Synco. Synco's melodic world has been overtaken with syncopation, unruly entities that cause disruption in the melodies of the land.

Become Synco and let the instruments of the melody guide you as you follow the music to jump and skip to the right path and slay your enemies to restore melodic order.

Credits
Mia Katarina Andric - Lead designer, music composition
Leonora Bryndum - Designer, project manager
Amadeja Spes - Lead visual artist, designer
H. Kathinka Kirkegaard - Designer, visual artist
Roxanne Angeline van Dam - Programmer
Oliver Jørgensen - Programmer
Oliver Leth Kristensen - Programmer
